bill.title: Sales tax; provide for a diversion to a county of collections in fire protection districts with 5 or more casinos.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 27-65-75, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That 18-1/2% Of The Total Sales Tax Revenue Collected Each Month On Business Activities Within A Fire Protection District Created Pursuant To Section 19-5-151 Et Seq. In Which Five Or More Gaming Licensees Are Located Shall Be Allocated For Distribution To The County In Which The Fire District Is Located And Paid To The County; To Provide That The Money Allocated For Distribution And Credited To Such A County Shall Be Utilized By The County For Tourism Projects And Economic Development Projects That Are Approved By The Mississippi Development Authority; And For Related Purposes.
